snippet: A construction materials maker was unable to meet interest payments on bonds in the latest sign that slowing economic growth is hurting companies and investors.
abstract: China’s two-year-old market for domestic junk bonds has its first default as a manufacturer of construction materials fails to meet interest payments; move offers latest sign that slowing economic growth is hurting country's companies and investors.
lead_paragraph: A construction materials maker was unable to meet interest payments on bonds in the latest sign that slowing economic growth is hurting companies and investors.

headline.main: Junk Bond Default a Sign of China’s Slowing Growth
headline.print_headline: Junk Bond Default a Sign of China’s Slowing Growth
